greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, coefficients of the polynomials P(m, n) = Sum_{k=1..n} binomial(m*n, m*k)* P(m, n-k)*z with P(m, 0) = 1 and m = 3.
maple: P := proc(m, n) option remember; if n = 0 then 1 else
add(binomial(m*n, m*k)*P(m, n-k)*x, k=1..n) fi end:
for n from 0 to 6 do PolynomialTools:-CoefficientList(P(3,n), x) od;
for n from 0 to 6 do A278073_row(n) od;
mathematica: With[{m = 3}, Table[Expand[j!*SeriesCoefficient[1/(1 - t*(MittagLefflerE[m, x^m] - 1)), {x, 0, j}]], {j, 0, 21, m}]];
program: return expand(sum(binomial(m*n, m*k)*P(m, n-k)*x for k in (1..n)))
for n in (0..6): print(A278073_row(n)) # _Peter Luschny_, Mar 24 2020
xref: Cf. A014606 (diagonal), A243664 (row sums), A002115 (alternating row sums), A281479 (central coefficients), A327023 (refinement).
results.author: _Peter Luschny_, Jan 22 2017
